languages.text: "Можно еще попросить Идиру продемонстрировать свой талант... Хотя нет, идея хуже внезапно пробудившегося вулкана, шерин. Забудьте".

traits.locale_text: "Можно еще попросить Идиру свои фокусы показать... Хотя нет, так себе идея, забудьте".

languages.text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."
languages.original_text: "Можно еще попросить Идиру продемонстрировать свой талант... Хотя нет, идея хуже внезапно пробудившегося вулкана, шерин. Забудьте".

traits.locale_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."
"You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."
"You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."
"You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

languages.text: “或者，你也可以让伊迪拉发挥她的力量……不过我转念一想，还是别了吧。她的力量可能会比突然爆发的火山更加可怕，亲爱的，还是算了吧。”
languages.original_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

traits.locale_text: “或者，你也可以让伊迪拉发挥她的力量……不过我转念一想，还是别了吧。她的力量可能会比突然爆发的火山更加可怕，亲爱的，还是算了吧。”

languages.text: «También podría pedirle a Idira que usara su talento... Bien pensado, no, eso podría acabar de forma tan desastrosa como un volcán en erupción. Olvídelo, shereen».
languages.original_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

traits.locale_text: «También podría pedirle a Idira que usara su talento... Bien pensado, no, eso podría acabar de forma tan desastrosa como un volcán en erupción. Olvídelo, shereen».

languages.text: 「イディラに才能を発揮してもらうか…。いや、考えてみたら、そいつは突然火山が噴火するよりひどいことになりそうだ。忘れてよ」
languages.original_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

traits.locale_text: 「イディラに才能を発揮してもらうか…。いや、考えてみたら、そいつは突然火山が噴火するよりひどいことになりそうだ。忘れてよ」

languages.text: « Vous pourriez également demander à Idira de se servir de son talent. Encore que... Non, tout bien réfléchi, je vous le déconseille. Elle est aussi instable qu'un volcan en sommeil. Oubliez ce que j'ai dit. »
languages.original_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez également demander à Idira de se servir de son talent. Encore que... Non, tout bien réfléchi, je vous le déconseille. Elle est aussi instable qu'un volcan en sommeil. Oubliez ce que j'ai dit. »

languages.text: "Ihr könntet auch Idira bitten, ihr Talent einzusetzen ... Das heißt, doch lieber nicht, die Katastrophe könnte größer sein als ein plötzlicher Vulkanausbruch, Shereen. Vergesst es."
languages.original_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könntet auch Idira bitten, ihr Talent einzusetzen ... Das heißt, doch lieber nicht, die Katastrophe könnte größer sein als ein plötzlicher Vulkanausbruch, Shereen. Vergesst es."

languages.text: "Ayrıca İdira'nın yeteneklerini kullanmasını isteyebilirsin. Gerçi tekrar düşündüm de... O zaman başımıza iş açarız şirinim. Boş ver."
languages.original_text: "You could also ask Idira to use her talent... On second thought, no, that could be more disastrous than a suddenly erupting volcano, shereen. Forget it."

traits.locale_text: "Ayrıca İdira'nın yeteneklerini kullanmasını isteyebilirsin. Gerçi tekrar düşündüm de... O zaman başımıza iş açarız şirinim. Boş ver."
